page.shortlink: api desktop api xdialog commands begin embedded
page.description: The {BEGINEMBEDDED} command allows you to embed an Xdialog within another Xdialog with in-line code, rather than using the {EMBEDDED} command to define a window within the parent xdialog in which the embedded dialog will be displayed.
